task.title: Task
task.closeAndStart: Close task and start a new one
task.delete: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)
task.shareWithOrganizationDescription: Only members of your organization can access
task.sharePubliclyDescription: Anyone with the link can access

about: Generate, refactor, and debug code with AI assistance. Check out our <DocsLink>documentation</DocsLink> to learn more.
onboarding: Your task list in this workspace is empty.

boomerangTasks.title: Task Orchestration
boomerangTasks.description: Split tasks into smaller, manageable parts

stickyModels.title: Sticky Models
stickyModels.description: Each mode remembers your last used model

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Allow the AI to solve problems by browsing the web, running commands, and more

customizableModes.title: Customizable Modes
customizableModes.description: Specialized personas with their own behaviors and assigned models

enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
addContext: @ to add context, / to switch modes
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

checkpoint.initializingWarning: Still initializing checkpoint... If this takes too long, you can disable checkpoints in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> and restart your task.

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

instructions.wantsToFetch: Roo wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: Roo wants to read this file:

fileOperations.didSearchReplace: Roo performed search and replace on this file:

fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: Roo wants to append content to the end of this file:

directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: Roo recursively viewed all files in this directory:

directoryOperations.didViewRecursiveOutsideWorkspace: Roo recursively viewed all files in this directory (outside workspace):

mcp.wantsToAccessResource: Roo wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server:

modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: Roo wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.completionInstructions: Subtask completed! You can review the results and suggest any corrections or next steps. If everything looks good, confirm to return the result to the parent task.

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve55:
autoApprove.description: Auto-approve allows Roo Code to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust. More detailed configuration available in <settingsLink>Settings</settingsLink>.

announcement.title: ðŸŽ‰ Roo Code {{version}} Released
announcement.description: Roo Code {{version}} brings major new features and improvements based on your feedback.
announcement.feature1: <bold>Roo Marketplace Launch</bold>: The marketplace is now live! Discover and install modes and MCPs easier than ever before.
announcement.feature2: <bold>Gemini 2.5 Models</bold>: Added support for new Gemini 2.5 Pro, Flash, and Flash Lite models.
announcement.feature3: <bold>Excel File Support & More</bold>: Added Excel (.xlsx) file support and numerous bug fixes and improvements!
announcement.detailsDiscussLinks: Get more details and discuss in <discordLink>Discord</discordLink> and <redditLink>Reddit</redditLink> ðŸš€

browser.rooWantsToUse: Roo wants to use the browser:

systemPromptWarning: WARNING: Custom system prompt override active. This can severely break functionality and cause unpredictable behavior.
profileViolationWarning: The current profile violates your organization's settings

shellIntegration.title: Command Execution Warning
shellIntegration.description: Your command is being executed without VSCode terminal shell integration. To suppress this warning you can disable shell integration in the Terminal section of the Roo Code settings or troubleshoot VSCode terminal integration using the link below.
shellIntegration.troubleshooting: Click here for shell integration documentation.

autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Request Limit Reached
autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.description: Roo has reached the auto-approved limit of {{count}} API request(s). Would you like to reset the count and proceed with the task?
